title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         The Little River Canyon National Preserve business office is located in the Little River Canyon Center building owned by our partner, Jacksonville State University Field School. We lease office space from them. The National Park Service staffs the front desk of the Little River Canyon Center with Volunteers and staff to welcome visitors, give directions, etc.    Little River Canyon Center (Jacksonville State University Field School) REGULAR OPERATING HOURS   10:00 AM-4:00 PM Daily -  Central Standard Time     Little River Canyon National Preserve Business Office   REGULAR OPERATING HOURS   Monday - Friday 8:00 AM-4:30 PM     CLOSED for HOLIDAYS 2016 January 1   New Year's Day January 18   Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr. February 15   Washington's Birthday May 30   Memorial Day July 4   Independence Day September 5   Labor Day October 10   Columbus Day November 11     Veterans Day November 24      Thanksgiving Day December 26 for Christmas Holiday  Canyon Mouth Picnic Area (This is a day-use area located in Cedar Bluff, Alabama) HOURS   Daily 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM Central Standard Time   There is a $3 user fee per vehicle for this area. Cars within the gates after hours are subject to be towed or locked in.      All areas of the park are open only during daylight hours.
